title: Is avoiding the question a logical fallacy? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, and its traditional Latin name is “ignoratio elenchi.” You can see the Wikipedia page about it here: Ignoratio elenchi - Wikipedia In some cases, though avoiding the question may come about through use of a “red herring,” which is a different but related fallacy, which involves providing some irrelevant consideration in an attempt to distract the listener. See here: Red herring - Wikipedia
